des: "Here's a great sauce for your BBQed ribs! Just keep basting this on those babies, and you'll be wishing you could eat ribs every night!"
ins: In a medium saucepan over medium low heat, combine the hot pepper sauce, lime juice, coffee, sugar, whiskey, honey, Worcestershire sauce, tomato paste and tomato sauce. Mix together well and allow to simmer for 30 minutes.
